name: Shrooms
description: Mutate your body to fit your gameplay and survive alone or with your friends in the exotic fungi-covered world of Shrooms.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel i5 2410M Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: These are ALPHA Requirements and might change in the future
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel i5 3350P Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: These are ALPHA Requirements and might change in the future
